title: Georgia O’Keeffe Red Hills with Flowers Matted Notecard
description:
Georgia O’Keeffe Red Hills with Flowers Matted Notecard

Print developed from Georgia O’Keeffe’s Red Hills with Flowers, 1937, from The Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Fascinated by contrasts in scale, Georgia O’Keeffe frequently juxtaposed enlarged still-life elements with far-off landscapes, as seen Red Hills with Flowers, an image of vibrant flowers magnified and set against the red hills that surrounded her New Mexico home

  • Print Reproduction
  • Image Dimensions:  4.5 x 7.875
  • Full Dimensions:  8 x 10 in. 
  • Material:  Premium cardstock
